Hello,
I've a problem crawling a site written in .NET with a form that uses=

VIEWSTATE hidden field for postback action. So the same url is used
for di=
splaying the form and for displaying the results (after post
back) that i'm=
 interested to crawl.
I read the issue HER-1218 and I think it could be a s=
olution.
Where can I find the complete code, not the patch, of this issue
i=
mplementation?
Is there another chance to post a form with some values (als=
o the
default values) i.e. reposting the hidden VIEWSTATE and some other fi=
elds?
